question: As per the World Bankâ€™s GEP report, what is the estimated GDP growth rate in the fiscal year 2021-22?
explanation:
The World Bank recently released its flagship Global Economic Prospects (GEP) report. As per the report, the global economic output is projected to grow by 4% in 2021.
World Bank also estimated that Indian economy would grow at 5.4% in fiscal year 2021-22 and by 5.2% in the following year 2022-23. Earlier, the World Bank had forecasted a contraction of 9.6% in fiscal 2020-21.
